tool_description: An API is used to send mail with subject, to address and some message text.
name: Simple mail sending
title: Simple mail sending

api_list.name: Send simple mail
api_list.description: Send simple mail with To address, subject and some messages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-mail-sending.p.rapidapi.com/mail/sendmail"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-mail-sending.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-mail-sending.p.rapidapi.com/mail/sendmail"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-mail-sending.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
